=== PHASE 6: ALL MATH FUNCTIONS TEST ===
BASIC TRIG (RADIANS):

COS(0)= 1  (EXPECT 1)

INVERSE TRIG:
ASN(0.5)= 0.523599  (EXPECT ~0.524)
ACS(0.5)= 1.0472  (EXPECT ~1.047)
ATN(1)= 0.785398  (EXPECT ~0.785)
LOGARITHMS AND EXPONENTIALS:
LOG(10)= 1  (EXPECT 1)
LN(2.71828)= 0.999999  (EXPECT ~1)
EXP(1)= 2.71828  (EXPECT ~2.718)
OTHER FUNCTIONS:
SQR(16)= 4  (EXPECT 4)
ABS(-7.5)= 7.5  (EXPECT 7.5)
INT(4.9)= 4  (EXPECT 4)
INT(-4.9)= -5  (EXPECT -5)
SGN(-10)= -1  (EXPECT -1)
SGN(0)= 0  (EXPECT 0)
SGN(10)= 1  (EXPECT 1)
DMS/DEG CONVERSIONS:
DMS(15.4125)= 15.2445  (EXPECT 15.2445)
DEG(15.2445)= 15.4125  (EXPECT 15.4125)
=== ALL FUNCTIONS WORKING ===
